verses.verse: בְּרֵאשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> be-re-Shit, In the beginning מַמְלֶ֛כֶת <WH4467> mam-Le-chet of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֥ם <WH3079> ye-ho-ya-Kim of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יֹאושִׁיָּ֖הוּ <WH2977> yo-shi-Ya-hu of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah הָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> had-da-Var came this word הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh this אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֔ה <WH3414> yir-me-Yah, unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me עֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'a-Seh to me Make לְךָ֔ le-Cha, מוֹסֵר֖וֹת <WH4147> mo-se-Rot thee bonds וּמֹט֑וֹת <WH4133> u-mo-Tot; and yokes וּנְתַתָּ֖ם <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Tam and put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on צַוָּארֶֽךָ׃ <WH6677> tzav-va-Re-cha. them upon thy neck

וְשִׁלַּחְתָּם֩ <WH7971> ve-shil-lach-Tam And send אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech them to the king אֱד֜וֹם <WH123> e-Dom of Edom וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech and to the king מוֹאָ֗ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, of Moab וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> Me-lech and to the king בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> am-Mon, of Ammon וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech and to the king צֹ֖ר <WH6865> tzor of Tyrus וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech and to the king צִיד֑וֹן <WH6721> tzi-Don; of Zidon בְּיַ֤ד <WH3027> be-Yad by the hand מַלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> mal-'a-Chim of the messengers הַבָּאִ֣ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im which come יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, to Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> tzid-ki-Ya-hu unto Zedekiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

וְצִוִּיתָ֣ <WH6680> ve-tziv-vi-Ta And command אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about אֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH113> 'a-do-nei-Hem unto their masters לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; them to say כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> tze-va-'Ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh thus תֹֽאמְר֖וּ <WH559> to-me-Ru Thus shall ye say אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֲדֹֽנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH113> 'a-Do-nei-Chem. unto your masters

אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti I have made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the earth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָדָ֤ם <WH120> ha-'a-Dam the man וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַבְּהֵמָה֙ <WH929> hab-be-he-Mah and the beast אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- are on פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei that [are] upon הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the ground בְּכֹחִי֙ <WH3581> be-cho-Chi power הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol, by my great וּבִזְרוֹעִ֖י <WH2220> u-viz-ro-'I arm הַנְּטוּיָ֑ה <WH5186> han-ne-tu-Yah; and by my outstretched וּנְתַתִּ֕יהָ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Ti-ha and have given לַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> la-'a-Sher who יָשַׁ֥ר <WH3474> ya-Shar meet בְּעֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> be-'ei-Nai. it unto whom it seemed

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, Now אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I נָתַ֙תִּי֙ <WH5414> na-Tat-ti And now have I given אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָאֲרָצ֣וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot all these lands הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these בְּיַ֛ד <WH3027> be-Yad into the hand נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar of Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon עַבְדִּ֑י <WH5650> 'av-Di; my servant וְגַם֙ <WH1571> ve-Gam also אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> chai-Yat and the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh, of the field נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti have I given ל֖וֹ <WH99999> lo לְעָבְדֽוֹ׃ <WH5647> le-'a-ve-Do. him also to serve

וְעָבְד֤וּ <WH5647> ve-'a-ve-Du shall serve אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, And all nations וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No him and his son וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- and his son's בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> be-No; son עַ֣ד <WH5704> 'ad until בֹּא־ <WH935> bo- come עֵ֤ת <WH6256> 'et until the very time אַרְצוֹ֙ <WH776> ar-Tzo of his land גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- again ה֔וּא <WH1931> Hu, he וְעָ֤בְדוּ <WH5647> ve-'A-ve-du shall serve בוֹ֙ <WH99999> vo גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> go-Yim nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> rab-Bim, and then many וּמְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> u-me-la-Chim kings גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> ge-do-Lim. and great

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become הַגּ֜וֹי <WH1471> hag-Goy And it shall come to pass [that] the nation וְהַמַּמְלָכָ֗ה <WH4467> ve-ham-mam-la-Chah, and kingdom אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will not יַעַבְד֤וּ <WH5647> ya-'av-Du which will not serve אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar the same Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> ba-Vel, of Babylon וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> ve-'Et אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher and which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will not יִתֵּן֙ <WH5414> yit-Ten and that will not put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צַוָּאר֔וֹ <WH6677> tzav-va-Ro, their neck בְּעֹ֖ל <WH5923> be-'Ol under the yoke מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech of the king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> ba-Vel; of Babylon בַּחֶרֶב֩ <WH2719> ba-che-Rev with the sword וּבָרָעָ֨ב <WH7458> u-va-ra-'Av and with the famine וּבַדֶּ֜בֶר <WH1698> u-vad-De-ver and with the pestilence אֶפְקֹ֨ד <WH6485> 'ef-Kod will I punish עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- that הַגּ֤וֹי <WH1471> hag-Goy that nation הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> ha-Hu he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until תֻּמִּ֥י <WH8552> tum-Mi until I have consumed אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> be-ya-Do. them by his hand

וְ֠אַתֶּם <WH859> Ve-'at-tem you אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּשְׁמְע֨וּ <WH8085> tish-me-'U Therefore hearken אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to נְבִיאֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5030> ne-vi-'ei-Chem not ye to your prophets וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about קֹֽסְמֵיכֶ֗ם <WH7080> ko-se-mei-Chem, nor to your diviners וְאֶל֙ <WH413> ve-'El about חֲלֹמֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH2472> cha-lo-Mo-tei-Chem, nor to your dreamers וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about עֹֽנְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6049> 'o-ne-nei-Chem nor to your enchanters וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- about כַּשָּׁפֵיכֶ֑ם <WH3786> kash-sha-fei-Chem; nor to your sorcerers אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who הֵ֞ם <WH1992> hem like אֹמְרִ֤ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim which speak אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, unto you saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo You will not תַעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> ta-'av-Du Ye shall not serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> ba-Vel. of Babylon

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> She-ker, a lie הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hem they נִבְּאִ֣ים <WH5012> nib-be-'Im For they prophesy לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an order הַרְחִ֤יק <WH7368> har-Chik unto you to remove you far אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al from אַדְמַתְכֶ֔ם <WH127> 'ad-mat-Chem, from your land וְהִדַּחְתִּ֥י <WH5080> ve-hid-dach-Ti and that I should drive you out אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem וַאֲבַדְתֶּֽם׃ <WH6> va-'a-vad-Tem. and ye should perish

וְהַגּ֗וֹי <WH1471> ve-hag-Goy, But the nations אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יָבִ֧יא <WH935> ya-Vi that bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צַוָּאר֛וֹ <WH6677> tzav-va-Ro their neck בְּעֹ֥ל <WH5923> be-'Ol under the yoke מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon וַֽעֲבָד֑וֹ <WH5647> va-'a-va-Do; and serve וְהִנַּחְתִּ֤יו <WH3240> ve-hin-nach-Tiv him those will I let remain still עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on אַדְמָתוֹ֙ <WH127> ad-ma-To in their own land נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וַֽעֲבָדָ֖הּ <WH5647> va-'a-va-Dah and they shall till וְיָ֥שַׁב <WH3427> ve-Ya-shav it and dwell בָּֽהּ׃ <WH99999> Bah.

וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to צִדְקִיָּ֤ה <WH6667> tzid-ki-Yah also to Zedekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, I spake כְּכָל־ <WH3605> ke-chol- all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim according to all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh these לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying הָבִ֨יאוּ <WH935> ha-Vi-'u Bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צַוְּארֵיכֶ֜ם <WH6677> tzav-ve-rei-Chem your necks בְּעֹ֣ל <WH5923> be-'Ol under the yoke מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- of the king בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> ba-Vel, of Babylon וְעִבְד֥וּ <WH5647> ve-'iv-Du and serve אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> o-To וְעַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> ve-'am-Mo him and his people וִֽחְיֽוּ׃ <WH2421> Vich-Yu. and live

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why תָמ֙וּתוּ֙ <WH4191> ta-Mu-tu Why will ye die אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְעַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> ve-'am-Me-cha, thou and thy people בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ba-Che-rev by the sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> ba-ra-'Av by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר֙ <WH1698> u-vad-Da-ver and by the pestilence כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, as the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַגּ֕וֹי <WH1471> hag-Goy against the nation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- will not יַעֲבֹ֖ד <WH5647> ya-'a-Vod that will not serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> ba-Vel. Babel

וְאַֽל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nay תִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> tish-me-'U Therefore hearken אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> div-Rei not unto the words הַנְּבִאִ֗ים <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im, of the prophets הָאֹמְרִ֤ים <WH559> ha-'o-me-Rim that speak אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, unto you saying לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo You will not תַעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> ta-'av-Du Ye shall not serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech the king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> ba-Vel; of Babylon כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> She-ker, a lie הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hem they נִבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> nib-be-'Im for they prophesy לָכֶֽם׃ <WH99999> la-Chem.

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo have not שְׁלַחְתִּים֙ <WH7971> she-lach-Tim For I have not sent נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- them saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וְהֵ֛ם <WH1992> ve-Hem they נִבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> nib-be-'Im yet they prophesy בִּשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> bish-Mi in my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> lash-Sha-ker; a lie לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an order הַדִּיחִ֤י <WH5080> had-di-Chi that I might drive you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem וַאֲבַדְתֶּ֔ם <WH6> va-'a-vad-Tem, and that ye might perish אַתֶּ֕ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you וְהַנְּבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> ve-han-ne-vi-'Im ye and the prophets הַֽנִּבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> han-nib-be-'Im that prophesy לָכֶֽם׃ <WH99999> la-Chem.
